uk.ac.ebi.mdk.tool
Class MappedEntityAligner<E extends Entity>

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.mdk.tool.AbstractEntityAligner<E>
      uk.ac.ebi.mdk.tool.MappedEntityAligner<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityAligner<E>
public class MappedEntityAligner<E extends Entity>
extends AbstractEntityAligner<E>

Entity aligner flattens all metrics (per matcher) into a single map which is then searched. This is ideal for a 'match any' comparison.

Author:
John May
